body_html:
Can you post the output of ldd on caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so ? Can you also post conda list caffe2 ?

You could rewrite the dependency location with patchelf, and I think if you set rpath in the right way then that will have precedence over system paths.
body_text:
Can you post the output of ldd on caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so ? Can you also post conda list caffe2 ?
You could rewrite the dependency location with patchelf, and I think if you set rpath in the right way then that will have precedence over system paths.
body:
Can you post the output of ldd on caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so ? Can you also post conda list caffe2 ?

You could rewrite the dependency location with patchelf, and I think if you set rpath in the right way then that will have precedence over system paths.
